All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AuditContext
AuditContext holds per-request user and request metadata.
AuditDispatcher
Dispatches audit logs via Kafka to decouple microservices from Elasticsearch.
AuditEntityListener
Listener that hooks into JPA lifecycle events to automatically audit entity changes.
AuditKafkaProducer
Responsible for sending audit log messages to a Kafka topic.
AuditLog
AuditLog is the core structure for audit records.
